Entries.default:
"Please, I did nothing!" 

You see a man being dragged along a rickety boardwalk toward a rusty cage that swings over the abyss. He strains against the guard's grip.

The guard delivers a savage backhand.
"Enough! Or do you wish to consign her to the Old City, as well?" The warrior casts a meaningful glance at a woman standing a short distance away.
"Your tongue flops like a dying fish - I tire of its stink. Lower him down!"

"Let him go!"

She screams at the guards, but she doesn't dare approach.

The man notices her. His face lights up with shame.
